meanings.definition: Capable of being obtained or gained.
meanings.sent1: The toy was acquirable at the store.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a flying car seemed acquirable to the children.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as acquirable as a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The secret to happiness is acquirable through kindness.

meanings.sent1: The acquirable skills made him a valuable employee.
meanings.sent2: The acquirable knowledge helped her succeed in her career.
meanings.sent3: The acquirable snacks in the pantry disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent4: His acquirable talent shone brightly on stage.
meanings.sent5: The acquirable tickets to the concert sold out within minutes.
